summary: This module defines a suite of unit tests that verify the functionality of the Stable Diffusion 3 inpainting pipeline. It uses lightweight mock components to exercise VAE handling, prompt and negative prompt variations, and the integration of prompt embeddings, ensuring the pipeline behaves as expected under different configurations.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the reliability of the Stable Diffusion 3 inpainting pipeline, preventing regressions and guaranteeing consistent image generation performance for downstream AI image editing applications.
